text: I always have a great experience at Tim Hortons! The coffee is consistently delicious, and their baked goods never disappoint. Whether I’m grabbing a quick coffee in the morning or enjoying a cozy evening treat, the staff are friendly and the service is quick too. The variety on the menu is impressive, i specially enjoy their donuts and sordough melts. Definitely recommend!

Tucked away from the city buzz, this café’s spacious layout create a truly calming space  perfect for reading, working, or just slowing down.

The moment you step in, you’re greeted by soft music, warm lighting, and the coffee aroma.

overall peaceful vibes. nice 👍🏻

Zoe and her colleague deserve a raise! Visited the outlet on Thurs morning and the 2 ladies were working flat out to meet walk-in and delivery orders. They managed to get my Breakfast Brew order done quickly 💪💪.

The Tim Hortons at Woodlands Health Campus offers exceptional service, delicious desserts, and great coffee. Their White Chocolate Mocha is my personal favorite, and I appreciate that the desserts are not overly sweet—likely tailored to suit the hospital setting. Overall, it’s a fantastic spot for quality coffee, treats, and outstanding hospitality.

Sandra was absolutely wonderful! She served our food with so much care and a big smile, making our visit extra special. Her warm and friendly attitude made us feel truly welcome. It’s rare to see such genuine hospitality, and Sandra definitely went above and beyond. Thank you for the excellent service—we’ll definitely be back!
